text:
The company that I am working with have been working with Liden Lift Truck for servicing our reach trucks and purchasing forklifts, and their service has been outstanding. Customer service also very excellent.

The team is professional. They ensure our equipment is in excellent working condition, minimizing downtime. Highly recommended for anyone needing forklift services or equipment!

I recently rented a stacker forklift from this company, and I couldn’t be more impressed with the level of service I received. James, went above and beyond to ensure everything was smooth from start to finish. He was incredibly knowledgeable, patient, and attentive to our needs, making sure we had the right equipment for the job.

I’ve had the pleasure of working with James Lee from Liden Lift Trucks for our stacker service needs. When we noticed an issue with our stacker, James responded quickly to our call and resolve the problem swiftly. I am so grateful for the exceptional service provided by him.

We have been renting 2 forklifts and 1 stacker unit from Liden over 12 years, they have always won us over with their excellent service reliability, on the few occasions the forklift broke down, whether due to electrical or technical issues, their skilled technicians responded quickly to resolve the issue causing us minimal downtime without disruption to our operations, saving us alot of money. With their support, our warehouse operations can run with high efficiency achieving our KPI.

Each renewal of contract, they provide us with brand new units with our company name and logo.

Ranked as our top vendor for reliability for past 10 years.

Competitive pricing with superb service support.
An 5 star company that provides high level of reliability and customer service. Has been  my organization preferred vendor for more than 5 yrs. Keep up the good work!!
